title: nambi anudinam
sahitya:
nambi anudinam anbu sheivOm vArIrE nArAyaNA Om enavE jagattIrE


anupallavi

  inba vazhi iduvE iha para sukhamellAm inidu namakkaruLum tani mudark-kaDavuLai


caraNam    pittup-piDittu mAya vattuvil mayangiyE pEi manam pErAshai nOi piDittalaiyAmal
nittiyanai shuddha niranjanAnandanai ninaittu ninaitturugi anaittum avanenrE
